fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-  Redirect players targeting one to the other.
- Players targeting player a will visit player b.
- Players not targeting player b will not visit player a.
- Players targeting player b will visit player c.
- Players targeting player a will not visit player b.
- Players targeting player b will visit player a.
- Players targeting a different player entirely will visit player a.
- Players targeting player a will visit player a.
- Players targeting player b will not visit player c.
